response.overview: True Iran: The Global Jihad, is a feature-length documentary that examines Iran's legacy of terror and its long-term strategy to build the most formidable military in the Middle East. The world's leading experts on the subject expose the mullahs' ultimate objective; Iran's worldwide clandestine activities; and its active agenda to destabilize the West with the worldwide refugee crisis.
response.title: True Iran: The Global Jihad
